question_content.barrons:question: Anyone who has ever stepped in sticky hot tar on a summer day knows that melted tar is a highly __________ substance.
question_content.barrons:explanation:
viscous, tenacious.

The key phrase here is sticky hot tar. Melted by definition is sticky or viscous. It can also be described as tenacious (adhesive). Note the use of the secondary meaning of tenacious here.

Permeable is incorrect. The key phrase here is "sticky hot tar." Permeable means penetrable or porous. It makes no sense in the context.

Caustic is incorrect. The key phrase here is sticky hot tar. Caustic means stinging or corrosive. It makes no sense in the context.

Immutable is incorrect. The key phrase here is sticky hot tar. Immutable means unchangeable or static. It makes no sense in the context.

Ephemeral is incorrect. The key phrase here is sticky hot tar. Ephemeral means transient or fleeting. It makes no sense in the context.
